title: Watch this beaker disappear
author: NileRed Shorts
description:
Check out my main channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/NileRed
-------------------------------------------

For this one, I want to make a regular beaker disappear. To do this, I'll first put it in another 
beaker, then I'll pour in a goopy liquid, then almost like magic, the beaker slowly disappears.

• Nile talks about lab safety (chemistry is dangerous): https://youtu.be/ftACSEJ6DZA​

•NileRed Store: https://bit.ly/3BHx06i

-------------------------------------------

localize.title: このビーカーが消えるのを見る
